channel.title: Comments for Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: Comment on I liked the new teaser for the zombies map forsaken so much that I decided to print it for fun. Thought it might look cool up on my refrigerator! by Solo-nite
item.dc:creator: Solo-nite
item.description: That looks awesome... the picture gives me tranzit loading screen vibes
item.content:encoded: That looks awesome… the picture gives me tranzit loading screen vibes

item.title: Comment on I liked the new teaser for the zombies map forsaken so much that I decided to print it for fun. Thought it might look cool up on my refrigerator! by JoeyTheMan2175
item.dc:creator: JoeyTheMan2175
item.description:
*Lullaby for an Earth Angel begins to play
(then suddenly stop and distort as you wake up in a bus station and cock your M1911)
item.content:encoded:
*Lullaby for an Earth Angel begins to play

(then suddenly stop and distort as you wake up in a bus station and cock your M1911)
